properties.name: springbootwebfluxjjwt.password.encoder.iteration
properties.description: Iteration numbers for generating the key

properties.name: springbootwebfluxjjwt.jjwt.secret
properties.description: This is secret for JWTHS512 signature algorithm that MUST have 64 byte length

properties.name: springbootwebfluxjjwt.jjwt.expiration
properties.description: Expiration time for token in seconds
